pages.title: Valvarad (Lachesis)
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gotchard (2023, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:gotchard/arsenal/valvarusher)Valvarusher$(/l) and $(l:gotchard/devices/valvaradraw_buckle#valvaradraw_buckle_lachesis)Valvaradraw Buckle$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Speed$(li)Jump Boost
